category.name: Quick Reference
category.doc:
#### Serializable types
- Both value & pointer - int - long int - long long - float - double - bool - string - char - custom serializable classes
- Only value - vector <any\_of\_the\_above> - vector <any\_of\_the\_above\*>
- Magical features - inheritance of custom serializable classes (any depth) - polymorphism of custom serializable classes
